hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select form_def.uuid as uuid, form_def.name as name, form_def.displayName as displayName, form_def.version as version, form_def.moduleName as moduleName, form_def.moduleId as moduleId, form_def.code as code, form_def.code as code from DyFormDefinition form_def where form_def.formDisplay = '1' and exists( select code,max(version) from DyFormDefinition o group by code having o.code = form_def.code and max(version) = form_def.version ) <if isNotBlank(name) || isNotBlank(displayName) || isNotBlank(version) || isNotBlank(moduleName) || isNotBlank(moduleId) || isNotBlank(code) || isNotBlank(code)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(name)> or form_def.name like '%' || :name || '%' </if> <if isNotBlank(displayName)> or form_def.displayName like '%' || :displayName || '%' </if> <if isNotBlank(version)> or form_def.version = :version </if> <if isNotBlank(moduleName)> or form_def.moduleName like '%' || :moduleName || '%' </if> <if isNotBlank(moduleId)> or form_def.moduleId like '%' || :moduleId || '%' </if> <if isNotBlank(code)> or form_def.code like '%' || :code || '%' </if> <if isNotBlank(code)> or form_def.code like '%' || :code || '%' </if> ) </if> order by form_def.code, form_def.displayName
